name: UpdateFastlyService
description:
Update a Fastly service for an account in Datadog.

Use this tool to update specific details of a Fastly service associated with an account in Datadog. Useful for modifying service configurations.

parameters.name: fastly_account_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Fastly account to be updated.

parameters.name: fastly_service_id
parameters.description: Provide the Fastly Service ID to specify which service to update.

parameters.name: fastly_service_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Fastly service to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Fastly service.

parameters.name: fastly_service_json_api_type
parameters.description: The JSON:API type for this API, which should always be `fastly-services`.

value_schema.description: The JSON:API type for this API. Should always be `fastly-services`.

parameters.name: fastly_service_tags
parameters.description: A list of tags to update the Fastly service with. Each tag should be a string.

value_schema.description: A list of tags for the Fastly service.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.tags
parameters.description: A list of tags for the Fastly service.

value_schema.description: A list of tags for the Fastly service.

parameters.name: data.id
parameters.description: The ID of the Fastly service.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Fastly service.

parameters.name: data.type
parameters.description: The JSON:API type for this API. Should always be `fastly-services`.

value_schema.description: The JSON:API type for this API. Should always be `fastly-services`.
